name: Tournament Top-K Results
description: Results from Tournament-based top-K selection algorithm.
method: Tournament Top-K - uses tournament-style pairwise comparisons to select top-K documents

columns.did: Stringified list of top-K document IDs in ranked order

bier_formatted_tour_10_25.json.description: Formatted results as JSON mapping qid -> {doc_id: rank}
bier_formatted_tour_10_25.json.format: JSON object where keys are query IDs, values are objects mapping doc_id to rank (10=best, 1=worst)

bier_metrics_tour_10_25.csv.description: Pre-computed HGT metrics for K=10, 25 queries
